.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.3 (2013-07-27)
++++++++++++++++++

* Only files that have changed get uploaded. Files are checked for changes by
  comparing the local and remote MD5 hashes of the files.

0.2 (2013-07-17)
++++++++++++++++++

* It works on Python 2.6 and 2.7.

0.1 (2013-07-14)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
